1.name: Creed
1.description: The House of Creed is an authentic, luxury house dedicated to the creation of highly original fragrances made from exquisite ingredients. The legend of the brand begins in 1760 when a pair of scented leather gloves was delivered to King George III by a new London tailoring company. Founded by James Henry Creed in the same year as the young Kingâ€™s accession, The House of Creed has created fragrances for the discerning  for over 260 years.

2.name: Dior
2.description: Christian Dior SE, commonly known as Dior, is a French luxury goods company controlled and chaired by French businessman Bernard Arnault, who also heads LVMH, the world's largest luxury group.

3.name: Xerjoff
3.description: Xerjoff is an Italian fragrance company from Turin founded in 2007 by Sergio Momo and Dominique Salvo and is known for its high-quality fragrances.
